channel.description: Recent content in planet on Nights of Wren

item.title: Jupiter in Monochrome
item.description: My first successful attempt at planetary photography! This was a tough job for my equipment, since my telescope is designed to be good at efficiently capturing long exposures of large dim objects like diffuse nebulae and not high-resolution millisecond-scale exposures of small bright objects. That said, I get a kick out of using my equipment wrong, and I’m very pleased with the amount of detail that’s visible. The Great Red Spot remains impressive even through a monochrome camera depriving it of its signature color.
